issue.title: typo in cmake file prevents loading of libAtlasSimInterface

content.raw:
Jose,
Sorry, might be a false alarm.  The problem was that I used `catkin_make` instead of using the top level `CMakeLists.txt`.  I updated the wiki instructions to soft link to the right `CMakeLists.txt`.  But should we consider moving the block that detects system architecture from top level `CMakeLists.txt` into `drcsim_gazebo_ros_plugins` (and maybe `drcsim_model_resources`)?
